item.title: [allstar] need help! comment with answer! [alltar]
item.dc:creator: @ReaperXScape ReaperXScape
item.description:
@ReaperXScape wrote:

client.java:2689: error: ‘.class’ expected
Methods.LevelUp(int skill);
^
client.java:2689: error: ‘;’ expected
Methods.LevelUp(int skill);
^
2 errors

what i did was i was cleaning my source more and i moved the levelup methods to a new class, now in client .java i call it and it doesnt work… ill show you :

–IN CLIENT CLASS :
public void levelup() {
Methods.LevelUp(int skill);
}

–IN OTHER CLASS :
public void LevelUp(int skill) {
switch (skill) {
/*OTHER STUFF IS IN HERE, CENSORED FOR NO REASON */
}
}

Read full topic
